title: Challenger Veteran looking for Dedicated Student
body:
~~ First of all, this is just some random account I'm on at the moment, so please don't 
add me here. The easiest way to add me will be skype or just reply to the thread.  ~~

I've been playing since Season 1, started in Bronze, and have worked hard over the years
to be the best that I can at this game. I have held multiple spots in the top 300 over the
past few years, played with well-known players on smaller teams, and coached Challenger
teams. After years of grinding soloQ and boosting, I no longer take much pleasure from this
game. What I'm looking for is a dedicated student who is willing to do whatever it takes to
improve. Everyone wants to be better, but casual won't work for me. You need to be ready
to listen and show me you can work for it. This would be very rewarding for me in a way of
giving back to the community and helping someone reach their full potential. Role is not
important but my preferences would be AD > Support > JG > Mid > Top. I have accounts
at pretty much all MMR and can duo with you some to help implement in game strategy. 
I'll be spectating your games and we'll discuss decision making. This is a serious post
and not something I'm looking to do short term. Ideally I would like to get to know you
and help you grow over time. If you can't handle criticism or believe you should be higher
elo but your teams suck, please don't add me. If you are not capable of accepting that
if you were right, you'd be higher elo without me.. then again, please do not add me. 
I'm not here to argue or debate.. I want someone who is coachable and ready to learn.
If this is you, please fill out a brief survey below and I will add you in game. I'm not going
to entertain any trolls either..  so many people get so salty about everything when you 
mention being a smurf or high elo. I'm in a place where I'm very bored with the game
and I'm looking to pursue something I'm passionate about which is helping people. 
If you would like that to be you, let's talk. 


Edit: Lol, one of my friends already found it was me. I can provide proofs in private but
I'm taking the pictures down for now. xD 

I will not be linking my main account in an attempt to conceal my identity but if that's 
something you care about, we can discuss in private. 


Please reply with: 


**Playing Since Season: 
Current Rank:
Highest Rank:
Main Position:
Time in Role:
Top 3 Champs & Why: 
Strengths:
Weakness:
Headset + Discord?:
Times you play:
Why you? :
**


I'm probably going to get flooded and will not leave this up for long, so if
you're interested I'd recommend replying fast.

replies.body: Don't need help because I feel it would be a waste of your time because I am sliver but I ]find it awesome that high elo players like yourself are helping the community. Keep up the good work man :D
Stop reposting if your not gonna take anyone who posted their stuff. You're wasting people's time.

> [{quoted}](name=Dragennd,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=7KGkYrZA,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-09-10T18:49:29.403+0000)
>
> Stop reposting if your not gonna take anyone who posted their stuff. You're wasting people's time.

You're wasting your own time coming and typing that message. 
If you don't hear from me you can assume I am not interested after
looking at op.gg etc. I have reached out to several. Thank you for
your interest.

Playing Since Season: 1
Current Rank: p5
Highest Rank: p3
Main Position: support 
Time in Role: 3 seasons
Top 3 Champs & Why: nami lulu raka kennen (I like ranged supports that can sustain, poke, kite, and teamfight.)
Strengths: mature player open to learning.
Weakness: I make dumb miatakes
Headset + Discord?: yes
Times you play: 6-11 est m-f
Why you? : I'm a dedicated streamer that's been playing for a long time. Willing to put in the hours and always open to feedback. Come check my stream at www.twitch.tv/arkaniwulff and see for yourself why.

Your reddit account is the exact same name as this one and it has league of legend posts.

Troll.

Playing Since Season: Season 6
Current Rank: Gold 5
Highest Rank: Gold
Main Position: Jungle and Support
Time in Role: entire time
Top 3 Champs & Why: Janna, Lulu, and Braum, Taric/ Rammus, Nunu, Maokai (Objective control and shield comps)
Strengths: Objective Control, Warding
Weakness: Wave Manipulation
Headset + Discord?: Yes and Yes
Times you play: Any time
Why you? : I would really like to learn from the best and improve to become a better player.
Troll post.

Playing Since Season: I have been playing since mid season 3, or maybe pre-season 3.

Current Rank: Currently I am plat IV

Highest Rank: DV was my highest end of season rank.

Main Position: I play ADC mainly, But will go jg mid/ if requested.

Time in Role: I started with ADC late last season as I felt I was starting to lack in the mid role and fall off and not do enough for my team from the position.

Top 3 Champs & Why: Ezreal, Because I feel the kite and positioning I can push around with him fits the needs for a lot of games when you have a team that cannot peel, or someone who needs to be able to survive on their own.
Tristana, This is mainly for when I have a team based around peel and tanks or such. So when the damage is lacking I look to pick up trist to make up for the faults on my team that could cause issues for us in the long run.
Vayne, This is just both of those above combined for when I have been playing at my best and can help lead my team to victory.

Strengths: I would have to say positioning is one of my strengths, as well as following the lead of my team. I tend to try and roam with my support when given the chance and things of the like. 

Weakness: CSing and decision making. 
I normally end up trading instead of farming and lose a good 2-3 creeps in the process of that. Normally by 1hp or something of the likes. I also constantly overvalue myself in game and find myself pushing into fights that my team never had a hope of winning and throwing the game away into the trash.

Headset + Discord?: Yes, I have both.

Times you play: I tend to play from around 4pm Central to 2-3am central. On weekends I am normally on all the time.

Why you? : I feel it is a skill based game that I can learn to better communicate in a team set, and learn to work with people instead of taking everything on myself.
Not to mention I, myself, find the game fun and such. 
Then there are friends, who I can often find on and spend time with.
Thanks for taking the time to read this and I appreciate any consideration.

Playing Since Season: 5
Current Rank: Diamond 5
Highest Rank: Diamond 4
Main Position: Mid
Time in Role: 
Top 3 Champs & Why: Fizz. I've been playing him since I joined league and his kit and play style is just really fun to work with in my opinion, but I am willing to try other champions down the road. I just wanted to stick to one to get better at it until reaching masters to understand the game.
Strengths: Laning
Weakness: Confidence, Tilting
Headset + Discord?: Both
Times you play: It depends on school and how much HW I get. I have a lot of time in weekend evenings, unless it's crammed with homework. In the weekdays, I can get one or two games in, but like I said before, it depends on the amount of HW I get.
Why you? : The competitive aspect of this game has kept me playing it for 3 seasons. I love the competitiveness and only want to get better so I can compete with the top players. I always want to increase my knowledge of the game and enjoy being criticized as it can help a lot to improve my game. Having a challenger player guide me on my journey will be super beneficial and I have no doubt my skill will increase rapidly if you decide to take me under your wing.

Playing Since Season: 4
Current Rank: Plat 2
Highest Rank: Plat 1
Main Position: Adc
Time in Role: 3 years
Top 3 Champs & Why: twitch because he's easy to carry with, trist because of her range and escape on w, Ashe she brings cc and engage
Strengths: Csing, teamfighting 
Weakness: learning how to turn ganks when I get camped bot 
Headset + Discord?: Logitech G933 and yes I have discord 
Times you play: all day
Why you? : Because I have potential to grow and All I need is a coach to help me clean up my play and I feel like I can climb and I practice and watch my vods a lot

Playing Since Season: End of season 5 is when I started, when kindred came out so I guess season 6? (Season 6 preseason is when I hit lvl 30 lol)
Current Rank: Gold 2 Solo P2 Flex
Highest Rank: Gold 2 
Main Position: Mid
Time in Role: Since I've started playing.
Top 3 Champs & Why: Ekko, I was a one trick Ekko when I was learning the game and he's honestly the reason that I enjoyed playing league and also the reason I am a mid main now. Orianna, I loveeee orianna she's honestly so much fun. I love having the ability to carry the game or change a losing game into a winning one with a well placed ult. Corki, I just picked him up and I've found him to be a lot of fun. He's pretty strong right now and since playing lane passively is something I enjoy doing, it helps cater to my playstyle.
Strengths: Warding up for my team, Communication, Teamfights, listening to shotcalls, adapting to the meta, csing (I have been practicing my csing but my average with just last hitting comes out to be 38/44 by 5:05)
Weakness: Map Awareness, Being aggressive in lane, smart wards while laning (Basically laning in general), Macro play
Headset + Discord?: I have both
Times you play: I play everyday in the evening. Mondays and Tuesdays I get on around 10pm EST, every other day I get on around 6pm EST. Weekends I'm on all day.
Why you? : I have really been trying to get better and catch up to everyone who has been playing this game for a long time. I am super competitive and strive to become the best in my passions. I'm currently on a team and everyone on it is diamond or high plat and I feel like my inexperience is holding them back a little. My macro game isn't the strongest so I listen to shotcalls, but I want to be able to make smart decisions on my own or help carry the team in some way. I sincerely want to get better and have been watching faker and bjergsen play. I have also been regularly practicing csing for about 30-60 minutes a day and learning the combos on champions I struggle on. I am very interested in trying to get better and am completely open to any suggestions you may have. I would really appreciate this opportunity and I hope you consider me!

Playing Since Season: 5
Current Rank: Gold 2
Highest Rank: Gold 1
Main Position: Support
Time in Role: 1.5 years
Top 3 Champs & Why:
         1. Sona: Not mechanically intensive, lots of laning pressure, awesome heals, shields, and ult.
         2. Brand: Good poke, massive aoe damage
         3. I 1 tricked sona up to gold now just got into brand. But if i had to choose a third would be thresh: tankier option, good engage and disengage. Nice slow, 
             and lantern is useful
Strengths: Warding, lane pressure, objective control (timers, vision, etc)
Weakness: positioning, expecting enemy engage
Headset + Discord?: Check
Times you play: whenever i can, after 3 pm pst mon-fri, saturday mornings.
Why you? : I play this game to improve, I play to win and to climb, and have been looking for someone to coach me for a while. Sometimes its hard to know what I did wrong. and how I should have correctly responded to the situation. I would so very much love to get to know a player that has become one of the best in the na and hopefully pick up from them so I can improve.

Playing Since Season: Mid- Season 4
Current Rank: Platinum 3
Highest Rank: Platinum 3
Main Position: AD Carry
Time in Role: Ive played AD Carry pretty much since i started getting into the game competitively.  Ive bounced from Mid lane to Ad Carry many of times but i feel like AD Carry is what im best at.
Top 3 Champs & Why: Lucian, Ezreal, Sivir. These three seem to be my best champions. I feel that the more mobile my champion the better i play with that champion. My mechanics seem to shine when im able to be very versatile with movements.
Strengths: My strengths seem to be team fight positioning and targeting. It also takes me a lot to tilt and im very self critical. 
Weakness: My laning phase to has to be my biggest weakness. Trading and getting the maximum amount of damage out in lane is something im stilll not sure how to do. i can be very passive if im not confident. 
Headset + Discord?: I have a headset and a microphone i use, and i do have discord.
Times you play: I play everyday  at around 6 PM central to 12 AM.
Why you? : I am very committed. I enjoy getting advice or criticism. I will be very indebted to you for helping me out. This is very important for me because i am looking to join a college team next year and i need to be in very good shape. I'm easy to work with and be around. I will put the work in with the given direction.

Playing since season: 2
Current rank: Gold 4
Highest Rank: Plat 1
Main Position: ADC
Time in Role: Over 10 years
Top 3 champs and why: Ashe Ezreal Sivir. I Like playing champions that have skill shots and I dislike how riot tried to pidgeon hole everyone onto the same 3 champs in every role.
Strengths: Laning, teamfights, csing, mechanics
Weakness: WARDING, reading ganks
Headset + Discord: No, but can get if needed
Times you play: 3pm-9am Mountain time
Why me?: Because I know that I have what it takes. I have the determination and I want to play professional video games more than anything.

Why you? : I think choosing me as your dedicated student will be mutually beneficial. I am willing to put in the work, and I have a coach-able personality. I know I am not good at this game, and I have a lot to learn. I love to learn and I will always have a positive attitude. Thanks for your time.

Playing Since Season: 2
Current Rank: Gold 3
Highest Rank: Plat 1
Main Position: Support
Time in Role: Past 2 or 3 seasons I think?
Top 3 Champs & Why: Janna, Soraka, Lulu (Because I think they are in the meta right now)
Strengths: Teamwork, Communication, Objectives
Weakness: Reflexes
Headset + Discord?: Yes
Times you play: PST evenings and weekends.

Playing Since Season: 1
Current Rank: Silver 4
Highest Rank: Plat 5
Main Position: ADC is my main Mid would be me 2nd
Time in Role: About 2 seasons playing adc now. Was a Top main before that
Top 3 Champs & Why: Lucian is my number 1 I love how mobile he is and all of his outplay potential in his kit aswell as the team play aspects he brings. I played him since he came out and have loved him since even through the nerfs. My second would be probably Trist. With everything she brings to the team she is a all around great champ to play between he super strong range at max level and her tower pushing capabilities you can hardly go wrong with her. My 3rd would be Ashe. Once again because of the amount of team play she brings with her ult for ingages and her hawkshot to spot the jungler in his rought.
Strengths: My biggest strength i would have to say is my time in the game. I have learned alot over the years but i also do understand that i do still have alot to learn. I am very humble and understand that i am not amazing and that I have alot of work i still have to do to be good. I am very commited to the game and am getting back into heavily playing after having to do alot of traveling for work and not having the ability to play much this year.
Weakness: I am very bad with certain things in game that i have been working on alot to get better at. Timings, active items, extencive map awarness, and some other things. I play to many champs at a time instead of spamming one at a time to learn the ins and outs of them one by one. I have trouble with losing my focus in games or in the vise versa focusing to hard on certain things which i have been working on but still struggle with a bit. I am overly harsh on myself on my mistakes especially ones i know i shouldn't be making which eventually tilts me. Weak with lane matchup knowledge and rotations in the early-mid game.
Headset + Discord?: I have both a headset and discord
Times you play: I play anytime between 2pm-6am EST on monday through friday. and free anytime on the weekends.
Why you? : I have always taken the game very seriously. Have had teams in smaller tournaments and have always tryed to be the best i can be at the game. I have played for a RMU so i have some experience with being coached already but would really like to persue being coached again and build on the basis that i was already working on before to become better at the game. I am commited to the game fully and play it in most of my free time and always seek to improve. Still do alot of the stuff i did to help me back in college when i played to improve and would like to learn more ways to help me improve aswell as get expert opinions and guidence on alot of things. I have alot of goals to get back into team play cuz i have a strong competative drive and love working with teams. Aswell as self goals to keep climbing as much as i can. I have reached Plat before and plan to get back to it then keep improving to diamond and if possible higher.

Thank you for your time.
IGN EyItsMeLmaoXD

IGN KidKyuubi 
Been playing since season 4, didn't get into ranked until season 5/6
Current Silver 1
Highest Gold 5
Main role ADC
Mains: Kog , Ez, Lucian. Lucian for burst, Ez for utility and kiting and kog for tank shredding
Strengths; try to keep level headed and focused
Weaknesses: some decision making and lane match ups
Yes I have a mic/headset and discord
Times I play; 1 week ill play from 7pm-12am, next 1230am to 330am and most of the weekends
Why me; I genuinely enjoy the game and have always wanted to get better at the game after trying many roles I picked adc and have stuck with it. I believe I can be better with some coaching and would eventually like to be the best that I can be with others. Also wished one day to make it on the pro scene.
Thanks for the Consideration! hope to hear from you

Playing Since Season: mid season 4
Current Rank: Plat 5
Highest Rank: Plat 1 series
Main Position: ADC
Time in Role: about a year and a half
Top 3 Champs & Why: Vayne (although I've been playing more early game champs for the meta) Caitlyn, Jinx
Strengths: Mechanics
Weakness: Decision making at times, getting tilted, trying to stay calm
Headset + Discord?: I have both.
Times you play: Weekdays - depends when I work, usually after 6PM est (9pm if I work) and Saturdays are always free.
Why you? : After getting so close to Diamond and then dropping, I feel like I can do it but I'm obviously missing something. I know I need to work on not tilting and not being emotionally attached to whether or not we win the game, which is still hard. I want to prove that not all girls play support and are boosted.

(Also, I changed my name to Xatura , I don't know why boards is still showing this name.)

IGN: Mistr
ADC main, playing Twitch, Jinx, Jhin.
Secondary role is support.
I'm down to learn hit me up mate :)

Playing Since Season: 6
Current Rank: D5
Highest Rank: D4
Main Position: Support/ADC
Time in Role: The entire time ive been playing, minus a month or two for learning top/jng
Top 3 Champs & Why: Thresh, Rakan, Bard. I enjoy play making and changing the out comes of games. ADC: Vayne, Ezreal, Lucian
Strengths: Quick to learn, mechanics, rotations, objective control, vision
Weakness: Mentally checking out of games. wave management.
Headset + Discord?: good quality mic and discord
Times you play: everyday, every night
Why you? : climbing elo dosent mean much to me, i genuinely want to get better and be the best i can be

Whats wrong with proving your main btw?

I'm kind of skeptical, I found your reddit and your previous posts on player recruitment. You just keep reposting the same thread?

> [{quoted}](name=463,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=7KGkYrZA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-09-10T18:40:54.806+0000)
>
> Whats wrong with proving your main btw?
> 
> I'm kind of skeptical, I found your reddit and your previous posts on player recruitment. You just keep reposting the same thread?

Nothing. It will all be proven in private. This isn't my account so you haven't found anything 
yet Mr. Reddit Dectective..  lol.  I've never evven posted anything on reddit so you certainly 
haven't found that. Be skeptical all you want, I am not interested in playing with you. 
Thank you for the interest though.

Hi, been playing since S5
Current rank is Silver 5,
Highest Rank was Silver 1
Main Position is ADC and Supp
Been practicing AD and supp since preseason,
Top 3 Champs: My Fav champ is Ryze because of his unique kit with shield and kiting, 
Favorite ADC is lucian because of his strong passive and dashing in and out, 
Last favorite is Cassiopeia because of decent laning and can carry team fights
Strengths: I think my strengths are map awareness/warding because of supporting, I watch streams every day (LCS, QT, Pants, Etc.) 
I try to practice every day on the things that I watch and learn, like LeagueCraft Videos (trading stance, rotations after first turret, proper teamfighting)
Weaknesses: Don't trust team mates to do their jobs, find myself lacking in engages. Hard to find chemistry with team
Yes Headset and Discord
I try to play every day usually afternoon around 1 until around 8
I think even for my low elo I have committed to learning the game and getting better on my own. When I first started playing the game my cousin told me I could never get challenger, and even though all the statistics around me telling me I suck and I will never get challenger, I really push myself to learn everyday win or lose. But i still want to win xd

Playing Since Season: 2
Current Rank: P4
Highest Rank: P2
Main Position: Mid
Time in Role: 3 seasons
Top 3 Champs & Why: Ahri (CC+mobile)    Lux (High dmg+ Long range)  Fizz (high dmg + mobile)
Strengths: map awareness 
Weakness: Over confidence 
Headset + Discord?: yes + yes
Times you play: 8 AM -5 PM
Why you? : ive been looking to improve ive been stagnant in the same role for 3 years and it demotivates me

Why Me?
I may not meet your criteria. I want to get better at this game, but I am not aiming for challenger (I mean it just seems unlikely). I started to play with my friend, but there is just a large skillgap between us and it feels bad. I would like to be able to play on an even field with my friend (Plat) without him feeling like I am bad or he has to carry.
At the same time, I would just like to make some real friends to play with often. I have had friends off and on in LoL, but for some reason or other we move on.

So I want to get better, I don't want to be carried, I want some friends.
I did start an alt account months ago to practice my ADC (it buys ADs with my IP). 

Playing since season: November Season 6
Current rank: Silver 1, probably like Silver 5 in non-support
Highest rank: Silver 1

Main position: Support, although I am in debate
Time in Role: 6 months (started season 7 at Top/jg)
Top 3 champs: Support has changed a lot recently. If I had to pick, Sona, Taric.

Strength: Want to improve, willing to follow team calls (in desperate situations, bad situations), very rarely give up
Weakness: Fear in lane, lane control/cs. There are more but I think my laning need most work

Headset. Discord: All forms of voice speak, mic, no headset (do footsteps matter)
Times you play: Central standard time. Schedule varies (monthly school changes). Right now often 3pm, but I am most often awake at 8pm-2am.

Wait did you just make a new post? Lol.

I'll redo my application I guess ._.

Playing Since Season: S1 ( played for fun with friends until S4 )
Current Rank: P4 ( Decay from D2 ) I've been playing on a smurf to practice though, so I don't have games on this account ( 463 )
Highest Rank: D2
Main Position: AD / Supp
Time in Role: Since S3
Top 3 Champs & Why: Cait , Sivir , Twitch - Easily for me to stay safe so I don't become a liability to my team, also I play Cait the most.
Strengths: Laning in general and staying alive
Weakness: Ironically dying to unexpected combos in team fights and generally map movement ( anything outside of laning )
Headset + Discord?: Yes
Times you play: Any day of the week except Tuesdays 1pm - 4pm ( Piano lessons )

Why you? : I'm already dedicating my own time to taking notes on my gameplay and I'm gradually getting back to my prior level. I think I have a lot of room in game knowledge department to expand on, and I know first hand the amount of work it takes for hardstuck D2 to Masters. I'm ready to put in serious effort to improve myself. I have a growth mindset and fully aware that solo Q to the top is based on your own individual performance.

I'm willing to go for challenger this season or the next. I don't wanna end my league career at D2, it's a little embarrassing lol.
